alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Charlotte and southwestern Sarasota Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of North Port to near Gulf Gate Estates. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Port Charlotte, Lake Sarasota, Gulf Gate Estates, Osprey, Gulf Cove, South Venice, Vamo, El Jobean, Laurel, Palm Island, Oscar Scherer State Park, Rotonda, Grove City, Warm Mineral Springs, Nokomis, Turtle Beach, Venice Gardens and Bee Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Sarasota
